message.content:
1. Neuroimaging studies have been conducted on the working memory.
2. These studies have identified important areas corresponding to the working memory.
3. The dorsolateral prefrontal cortex (DLFPC) is one of these important areas.
4. The DLFPC corresponds to the working memory.

messages.content:
Statement: Neuroimaging studies have shown that one of the most important areas corresponding to the working memory is the dorsolateral prefrontal cortex (DLFPC).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
